name: Rectangle Together
description:
We have two players to control and each of the two have different movement styles and abilities. PlayerOne (Green) has the ability to pull boxes and the other player. PlayerTwo (Red) has the ability to push boxes and the other player. We use these mechanics to avoid lasers, open doors and reach the exit.  

Known Bugs and Other Stuff:

Don't press "Exit" button.

Some bugs can be observable, be careful when colliding with walls. 

I made background music quiet on purpose but maybe its too quiet. 

In some cases, weird movement bugs can be appear when players or boxes connect.

My friends say it's more performant in firefox.

CONTROLS: 

WASD for PlayerOne movement. 

Hold Left Click: Use abilities. Left click is how you will move PlayerTwo 

C: Change current player.

 V: Detach everything you connected to your player.

 ESC: Esc Menu

Game made by Yusuf "EakyRtk" Gürsoy and Emre "Descless" Güçlü

Designs of Level 1 to 4 were made by Descless and every other job was made by EakyRtk in 4 days.

We firstly developed this game for PC and that version had particles. This version doesn't, because of us realising that we don't have Mac in the final hours.
